{{title}}

Count: {{cookings}}

{{cooking.title}}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ICooking } from './ICooking'; import { CookingService } from './cooking.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'Enjoying-Cooking'; cookings: ICooking[] = []; constructor (private CookingService: CookingService) {} ngOnInit() : void { this.getCookings(); } getCookings(): void{ this.CookingService.getAllCookings().subscribe(cooks => this.cookings = cooks); } }
